exceptions.exn: The LHS of prEq (getProtocol (mkWorld _) (plab _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
pr: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
ii: InductiveInv pr I
l: Ordered.sort Label

Goal:
nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) l) = nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld pr) l)

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
nid = nat : Set
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
InductiveInv = ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- Type] ?T' : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- Type] ?f : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- ?T'] ?s : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- seq ?T]
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- Type] ?B : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I l : Label |- Type]
getInvSendTrans : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) (z to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (s1 : state) (h : heap), st \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> forall S : send_safe st z to (getStatelet s1 (plab p)) msg, Some h = send_step S -> exists st' : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol (mkWorld p) (plab p))), [/\ st' \In get_st (mkWorld p) (plab p), t_snd st' = t_snd st, all_hooks_fire (mkWorld p) (plab p) (t_snd st') s1 z msg to & exists S' : send_safe st' z to (getStatelet s1 (plab p)) msg, Some h = send_step S']
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
Coherence.sort : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Coherence.cohpred nodes -> dstatelet -> Prop
send_trans : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
receive_trans : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
receive_step_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
prEq : forall p : protocol, getProtocol (mkWorld p) (plab p) = p
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
cohIDom : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), cohI p I d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes p d
cohI = fun (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) => [Pred d | coh p d /\ I d (nodes p d)] : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Simpl_Pred dstatelet Arguments cohI _ _%function_scope
s_safe_inI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safeI I st this to d m -> this \in nodes p d /\ to \in nodes p d
snd_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.snd_tags ([::] : seq (send_trans coh))) Arguments snd_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
rcv_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags ([::] : seq (receive_trans coh))) Arguments rcv_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
rtIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (r : ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I), r \In rts ii -> rcv_transI (rt_inv (r:=r)) \In rcv_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
stIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (s : ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I), s \In sts ii -> snd_transI (st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
s_safe_in : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
Protocols.Protocol : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Label -> forall (coh : cohpred nodes) (snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh)) (rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh)), uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans) -> uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans) -> Protocols.protocol
Protocol : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Label -> forall (coh : cohpred nodes) (snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh)) (rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh)), uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans) -> uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans) -> Protocols.protocol
Record cohpred (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) : Type := Pack { sort : dstatelet -> Prop; _ : Coherence.mixin_of nodes sort } Arguments Coherence.cohpred _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Pack [nodes sort]%function_scope
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
W = [eta mkWorld] : protocol -> world
send_safeI : forall p : protocol, (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> send_trans (coh p) -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
